scripts.test:coverage:check: vitest --coverage --run && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const data = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('coverage/coverage-summary.json', 'utf8')); const coverage = data.total.lines.pct; console.log('ðŸ“Š Coverage actuel:', coverage.toFixed(2) + '%'); if (coverage < 40) { console.error('âŒ Coverage insuffisant! Minimum requis: 40%, actuel:', coverage.toFixed(2) + '%'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('âœ… Coverage OK! Seuil atteint:', coverage.toFixed(2) + '% >= 40%'); }"
